text: haey anak( mou ham meat) minban now kber phnom tuo r noh te now pel del yeung ban srekhaw( mou sa) noh . bo nde daoy kdei me tda krounea pi mcheasa robsa anak ( trong ban tengtang anakchea anakneasar) daembi dasatuen promean dl krom del kmean anak dasatuen na mneak towdl puokke kalpimoun anak . sangkhumtha puokke nukkheunh
